headline: Ventas Reaches Mutually Beneficial Agreements With Brookdale
summary: Agreements with Brookdale Senior Living highlight VTR's strategy to drive profitable growth in the senior housing business.

raw.headline: Ventas Reaches Mutually Beneficial Agreements With Brookdale
raw.summary: Agreements with Brookdale Senior Living highlight VTR's strategy to drive profitable growth in the senior housing business.

headline: Ventas reaches agreements with Brookdale Senior Living under master lease
summary: Ventas (VTR) has reached mutually beneficial agreements with Brookdale Senior Living regarding all assets under the current Master Lease between Ventas and Brookdale. The Master Lease was previously set to expire on December 31, 2025. The agreements enable Ventas to accelerate the conversion of forty-four select large-scale senior housing communities – the SHOP Communities – to its Senior Housing Operating Portfolio, or SHOP, starting September 1, 2025.
